name: Starship Survivors
description:
STARSHIP SURVIVORS Version 0.001

sci-fi themed survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements

Try to survive as increasing amounts of enemies try to destroy you! Use the WASD or arrow keys to move around the map and the mouse to aim. There is unlimited dashing with the space bar right now but in future versions it will have a cool down. Right now the player health is set to 100000 and the bullet speed is set to max for "fun" so good luck dying. All of the assets are free from www.Kenney.nl except the background I made myself. Please leave a comment with any feedback you have for me!

This version is to showcase the base game play loop as I work on expanding it. Next I will be adding a leveling system that will unlock new powers as you grow stronger. Stay tuned for future updates!

Discord: https://discord.gg/DtXJHu5A83

The game features  7 tracks by White Bat Audio https://www.youtube.com/@WhiteBatAudio
